format: A data frame with 189 observations on the following 10 variables.
description:
Description
The data come to us from Hosmer and Lemeshow (2000). Called the low 
birth weight (lbw) data, the response is a binary variable, low, 
which indicates whether the birth weight of a baby is under 2500g 
(low=1), or over (low=0).
title: lbw
reference:
lbw is saved as a data frame.
Count models can use ftv as a response variable, or convert it to grouped format

parameters.ftv: number of physician visits in 1st trimester: 0-6
parameters.ptl: number of false of premature labors: 0-3
parameters.lwt: weight (lbs) at last menstrual period: 80-250 lbs
